content.rendered:
Download The New Gym app to experience many services and attractive offers exclusively for you! With many utilities on the application, members can easily search for information, check their training schedule and package in just one download.

3 WAYS TO CONTACT THE NEW GYM

Members can contact us:

Please contact us through the following ways:

Contact via Hotline The New Gym: 1900636920.
Contact via Email: cskh@thenewgym.vn
Contact via social networks:

Contact us via Facebook fanpage: The New Gym

Members can easily contact The New Gym via Facebook Fanpage, ask questions immediately, we will reply you as soon as possible. Or you can contact via the fan page of The New Gym branch.

Contact via Instagram: The New Gym
